statements: SELECT * FROM festival_logistics;
SELECT id, accommodation_details FROM festival_logistics;
SELECT transportation_schedule, accommodation_details FROM festival_logistics WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM festival_logistics WHERE transportation_schedule LIKE '%bus%';
SELECT id, transportation_schedule, accommodation_details FROM festival_logistics ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, transportation_schedule, accommodation_details FROM festival_logistics;
SELECT * FROM festival_logistics WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT accommodation_details, transportation_schedule, id FROM festival_logistics WHERE transportation_schedule LIKE '%bus%';
SELECT * FROM festival_logistics WHERE accommodation_details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, accommodation_details FROM festival_logistics LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT transport_id, transport_type, departure_time, arrival_time, transport_capacity FROM Transportation;
SELECT * FROM Accommodation WHERE accommodation_type = 'Hotel';
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_type, check_in_time, room_capacity FROM Accommodation ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT transport_type, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Transportation WHERE transport_capacity > 100 ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_type, room_capacity FROM Accommodation WHERE check_out_time < NOW();
SELECT * FROM Transportation WHERE transport_type = 'Bus' ORDER BY departure_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transport_id, transport_type, departure_time FROM Transportation WHERE transport_capacity > 50 ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_type, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM Accommodation WHERE room_capacity < 10 ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transportation WHERE transport_type = 'Train' AND departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-01 00:00:00';
SELECT accommodation_type, room_capacity FROM Accommodation WHERE accommodation_type LIKE '%Hotel%' AND room_capacity >= 20 ORDER BY room_capacity DESC, check_in_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule ORDER BY date ASC, departure_time ASC;
SELECT id, vehicle_type FROM transportation_schedule WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus';
SELECT name, role, contact_number FROM festival_stakeholders WHERE role = 'Sponsor';
SELECT * FROM accommodation_details WHERE check_in >= '2022-07-15' ORDER BY check_in DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM accommodation_details WHERE accommodation_type = 'Hotel';
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule ORDER BY date DESC, departure_time ASC;
SELECT id, vehicle_type FROM transportation_schedule WHERE vehicle_type='Bus' AND arrival_time > '16:00';

SELECT accommodation_details.location, festival_stakeholders.name FROM accommodation_details INNER JOIN festival_stakeholders ON accommodation_details.id = festival_stakeholders.accommodation_id WHERE festival_stakeholders.role = 'Organizer';
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_type FROM transportation_schedule;
SELECT * FROM festival_stakeholders WHERE accommodation_id IN (SELECT id FROM accommodation_details WHERE accommodation_type='Hotel');
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule;
SELECT route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM transportation_schedule WHERE vehicle_type='Bus';
SELECT MAX(price), MIN(price), AVG(price) FROM accommodation_details;
SELECT * FROM festival_stakeholders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT ticket_type, price, availability FROM festival_tickets WHERE availability > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule ORDER BY departure_time DESC, route ASC;
SELECT route, departure_time, arrival_time FROM transportation_schedule WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus';
SELECT accommodation_id, location, check_in_date, room_type, price FROM accommodation_details WHERE price < 100.00 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM festival_stakeholders WHERE role IN ('Organizer', 'Sponsor') ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM festival_tickets WHERE availability > 0 ORDER BY price DESC, ticket_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM festival_participants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM festival_participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_type FROM festival_suppliers WHERE supplier_type='Food';
SELECT stage_name, stage_capacity FROM festival_stages WHERE stage_capacity > 100;
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_type, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM accommodation_details;
SELECT * FROM transportation_schedule ORDER BY departure_time DESC
SELECT mode_of_transportation, departure_time, arrival_time FROM transportation_schedule WHERE mode_of_transportation='Train'
SELECT participant_name, participant_type FROM festival_participants WHERE participant_type='Performer' AND participant_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT accommodation_type, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM accommodation_details WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2023-02-01' AND '2023-02-28'
SELECT * FROM festival_stages WHERE stage_capacity > 500 ORDER BY stage_capacity ASC
